participant_1.background:
I finally got a new graphics card for my computer so I can play Quake at a higher resolution!
I sell insurance in Hollywood with my brother in law.
i never cook.
I like to walk around and listen to music to clear my head.
i try to find easy ways to make money.

participant_2.background:
I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition.
I love Disney movies, so I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery.
i have an older brother who plays football in the nfl.
My family is close-knit and we enjoy spending time together, especially on sunny days.
I enjoy spending time with my kids because it reminds me of a simpler time when I was younger.

content.text: Hey there! I hope you are having a great day so far!
Hey! I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing alright. Just got a new graphics card for my computer so I can play Quake at a higher resolution!
That's awesome! What kind of graphics card did you get?
I got an EVGA GTX 980 Ti. It's a pretty beastly card!
Nice! I'm sure it will really help you with Quake.
Thanks! I'm hoping it will. I love that game!
Me too! It's one of the best FPS games ever made.
Definitely! I'm so glad they're still making new content for it.
Me too! I'm excited to see what they do with the next expansion.
Me too! I'm sure it will be great.
